level.heading: Sales at wholesale.
level.text: ยง 20-678 Sales at wholesale. It shall be unlawful for any person to sell, or offer for sale at wholesale, any pickled, pumped, cured, or otherwise processed meats or meat products which shall contain added curing solution or any other liquid more than ten percent, by weight, of the total weight of the meat, except that pickled, pumped, cured, or otherwise processed beef brisket shall not contain more than twenty percent, by weight, of added curing solution or any other liquid.
